ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 500
ygData.msgSnippet: All I can say is that you are not foraging often enough--that is obvious.  What do you do on long runs? I click forage right before I sit down to heal after
ygData.messageBody:
All I can say is that you are not foraging often
enough--that is obvious. What do you do on long runs?
I click forage right before I sit down to heal after
each fight. I have four stacks of different food
items and I have 4 stacks of water. I have on
occasion had to buy water--but only because at that
time I was keeping only 2 stacks of water
going---Sometimes you run into a dry spell, so to
speak. Anyway, except for the occasional lack of
water--if you can't forage enough food to never buy
food again then I don't know what to tell you. It's
not a bug and I doubt my forage works alot better than
yours (although I am maxed at 40).

Thex


>
> Message: 7
> Date: Thu, 11 Nov 1999 08:14:57 -0600
> From: "Donny Dane" <ddane@...>
> Subject: Re: Digest Number 497
>
> Hehe, less than 50%, he says.
>
> I would guess my forage works about 5% to 10% at
> best. I've got it up in
> the high 30's (not maxed at 40 yet).
> It seems to take FOREVER to get a skill increase. I
> never forage enough to
> keep me fed, I always have to get some food at the
> shop, so i generally get
> 20 bread when I get water. Also, I seem to get
> water about 30% of the time
> I do get a success.
> I'm gonna mess with a log parser and see what the
> actual rates are, if not,
> I'll try to load my logs up into something to get
> some more definate
> figures.
> As it is, forage is not enough to even keep me fed,
> much less keep enough
> water around to drink.
>
> MacGrough
> 19th Song Bard
> Solusek Ro Wanderers
>


=====
